data.price: እውነተኛው ንጉስ አላህም (ከሓዲዎች ከሚሉት) ላቀ፡፡ ወደ አንተ መወረዱም ከመፈጸሙ በፊት በማንበብ አትቸኩል፡፡ «ጌታዬ ሆይ! ዕውቀትንም ጨምርልኝ» በል፡፡
data.arabic: فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡحَقُّۗ وَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ بِٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يُقۡضَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَحۡيُهُۥۖ وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدۡنِي عِلۡمٗا

meta.transliteration: fataʿālā al-lahu al-maliku al-ḥaqu walā taʿjal bil-qur'āni min qabli an yuq'ḍā ilayka waḥyuhu waqul rabbi zid'nī ʿil'man

dua.name: Dua for Clarity of Purpose
dua.significanceReason: Seeks increase in knowledge and clarity of purpose, helping believers understand their spiritual and worldly missions.

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
